name: 郭志宇
objective: A brief introduction of general chemistry and chemical reactions, covering atomic structure and bonding, quantitative chemistry, gas, thermodynamics, kinetics, etc. In addition to the basic principles of chemistry, this course will focus on letting students understand the relationship between chemistry and daily life.
schedule:
Week/Topic
1    Gases
2    Gases
3    Gases
4    Thermochemistry
5    Thermochemistry
6    Atomic Structure and Periodicity
7    Atomic Structure and Periodicity
8    Atomic Structure and Periodicity
9    Midterm Exam
10  Bonding: General Concepts 
11  Bonding: General Concepts
12  Bonding: General Concepts
13  Covalent Bondings: Orbitals
14  Covalent Bondings: Orbitals
16  Liquid and Solids
17  Liquid and Solids
18  Final Exam
materials: Chemistry 11th Edition, Steven S. Zumdahl, Susan A. Zumdahl, and Donald J. DeCoste (滄海圖書)
consultation: Email: chihyukuo@ntut.edu.twWe would have a TA helping us about the related issues.
